QuestData.Title: Menace to Society
QuestData.Description:
These troggs are a menace to the whole area! They raid camps and caravans and eat the livestock when they come down from their caves. The kids being up there might set them off!
Slay some of those troggs before they decide to cause trouble.
QuestData.RewardText: You look like you've been in a fight. Did you introduce those troggs to the business end of your weapon?$b$bThat's what I would have done! Give 'em a good right hook! And then a left! Pow! Bam!$b$bI bet they're sorry for messing with you!
